Description:
The geography of this island is unique, dominated by a vast crater that covers most of its area. 

Nearby, you'll find some trees and a streamlet, which can be used to replenish your ship's supplies. 

This is a good spot to rest before continuing your journey, or you might choose to explore the island further.
DescriptionAction: What would you like to do?

    "SSRewardText": "(Bernard) “Mmm... Did you know that this island underwent a dramatic change about seventy years ago? The Sahti folk believe that a great warrior was expelled from the heavens after a rebellion, and her landing created this crater. \r\n\nMmm... But between us, it wasn’t a rebellion. She’s too kind for that. I believe it was more of an... accident.”\r\n\nYou head to the location Bernard mentioned, where you manage to rest and find some shards before continuing on your journey.",
